S06pplg1__u:1_0: (LPG 1r) siddhaṃ namaḥ sarvajñāya evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasamaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati
S06pplg1__u:1_1: sma gṛdhrākūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paṃcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_2: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair
S06pplg1__u:1_3: ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_5: ekapudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā yad utāyuṣmantam ānandam* śaikṣaṃ srotāpannaṃ paṃcamātraiś
S06pplg1__u:1_6: ca bhikṣuṇīśatair yaśodharāmahāprajāpatīpramukhaiḥ saṃbahulaiś copāsakair upāsikābhiś
S06pplg1__u:1_7: ca sarvair dṛṣṭadharmabhiḥ mahatā ca bodhisatvasaṃghena sārdham aprameyāsaṃkhyeyair
S06pplg1__u:1_8: bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ samādhipratilabdhaiḥ śunyatāvihāribhir
S06pplg1__u:1_11: ādeyavacanair akusīdair ārabdhavīryaiḥ kāyajīvitanirapekṣair akuhakair alapakair
S06pplg1__u:38_0: maitreyeṇa ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena etaiś cānyaiś cānekair bodhisatvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
S06pplg1__u:38_1: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṃkam
S06pplg1__u:38_2: ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya tatra niṣadya samādhirājo
S06pplg1__u:38_3: nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt* yatra samādhau sarvasamādhayo 'ntargatā anupraviṣṭāḥ
S06pplg1__u:39: atha bhagavāṃ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃs tataḥ samādher vyutthāya divyena cakṣuṣedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vyavalokayati sma /
S06pplg1__u:40: vyavalokya sarvakāyāt prabhāṃ prāmuñcat* tasyādhastāt padatalayoḥ sahasrārābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma :
S06pplg1__u:41: daśabhyaś ca pādāṃgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
S06pplg1__u:42_0: evaṃ dvābhyāṃ gulphābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ jaṃghābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyām*
S06pplg1__u:42_1: kaṭer nābhimaṇḍalāt* dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyām* hṛdaye śrīvatsāt mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt* saṣṭiṣaṣṭī
S06pplg1__u:43: daśabhyo hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaraṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:44: evan dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyām* dvābhyām āṃsābhyām* grīvāyāś catasṛbhyo (LPG 2v)
S06pplg1__u:45_0: daṃṣṭrābhyaś catvāriṃśato dantebhyaḥ dvābhyāṃ cakṣubhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyām* dvābhyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:45_1: ghrāṇapuṭebhyām* madhye bhruvorṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt* mukhadvārāc ca ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī
S06pplg1__u:46_0: sarvāṇi ca tāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvāvantam imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06pplg1__u:46_1: lokadhātuṃ mahatāvabhāsena spharitvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn
S06pplg1__u:47: evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samaṃtād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:48: yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tena raśmyavabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:49_0: atha bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ prabhāṃ prāmuṃcat* yayā prabhayāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro
S06pplg1__u:49_1: lokadhātur mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt* pūrvasyāṃ ca diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavo
S06pplg1__u:49_2: mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād
S06pplg1__u:49_3: upariṣṭāt* yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavo
S06pplg1__u:49_4: mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan* yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tenāvabhāsena
S06pplg1__u:49_5: spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:50: atha bhagavān punar api yā sā tathāgatasya prakṛtiprabhā tayā prabhayemaṃ (LPG 3r)
S06pplg1__u:52: pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
S06pplg1__u:53: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭāt* yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātuṃs tena mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
S06pplg1__u:54: yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tenāvabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:55_0: atha bhagavān mukhadvārāj jihvendriyaṃ nirṇamayya sarvāvantam imaṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06pplg1__u:55_1: lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa spharitvā smitaṃ prādurakārṣīt* tataś ca jihvendriyād anekāni
S06pplg1__u:56: sarvatra ca raśmyāṃ nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni santiṣṭhante sma /
S06pplg1__u:60: tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgatavigrahā niṣaṇṇā dharman deśayaṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:61: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanāṃ te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn gacchanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:63_0: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanām* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām
S06pplg1__u:63_1: uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl
S06pplg1__u:65: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanām* yaiś ca satvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:66: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma buddhasamādhiṃ samāpadya tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma /
S06pplg1__u:69_0: avedhat* prāvedhat* saṃprāvedhat* acalat prācalat saṃprācalat* akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat
S06pplg1__u:69_1: saṃprākṣubhyat* agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat* araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat* anteṣūnnamati sma /
S06pplg1__u:71: madhya aunnamati smānteṣv avanamati sma / mṛdukaḥ
S06pplg1__u:72_0: snigdhaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sarvasukhasaṃjanano 'bhūt* atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena yāvanto
S06pplg1__u:72_2: te sarve samucchinnā abhūvan* sarve ca te satvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapannā
S06pplg1__u:72_3: abhūvan* cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ ca devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ
S06pplg1__u:72_4: paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sahabhāgatāyai upapannā abhūvan* atha te manuṣyās
S06pplg1__u:72_5: te ca devās tenaiva prītiprasādaprāmodyena paurvikīṃ jātiṃ samanusmaraṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:73: samanusmṛtya prītiprasādaprāmodyapratilabdhā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtā bhagavantaṃ namasyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:74_0: evaṃ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām
S06pplg1__u:74_1: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukāsameṣu
S06pplg1__u:74_2: lokadhātuṣu sarvanarakāḥ sarvatiryagyonayaḥ sarvayamalokā samucchinnāḥ sarvākṣaṇāś
S06pplg1__u:74_3: cāstamitā abhūvan* sarve ca te satvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sahabhāgatāyai upapadyante sma /
S06pplg1__u:75: atha te manuṣyās te ca devās tenaiva prītiprasādaprāmodyena paurvikīṃ jātiṃ samanusmaraṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:76_0: samanusmṛtya prītiprasādaprāmodyapratilabdhāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra
S06pplg1__u:76_1: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti tān upasaṃkramanti smopasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtās
S06pplg1__u:76_2: tāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān namasyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:78: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ satvās te 'pi sarve cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:86_0: rogaspṛṣṭā vigatarogā abhūvan* vikalendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā abhūvan* klāntakāyā
S06pplg1__u:86_1: aklāntakāyā abhūvan* avirahitākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmantājīvā vigatākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmantājīvā bhavanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:87_0: sarvasatvāś ca sarvasatveṣu samacittā abhūvan* yad uta mātāpitṛbhrātṛbhaginīsamacittāḥ
S06pplg1__u:87_2: śucayo nirāmagandhāḥ sarvākuśalavitarkavigatāḥ sarvasatvās tasmin samaye sarvasukhasamarpitā
S06pplg1__u:87_3: abhūvan* evaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samanvāgatās tadyathā tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoḥ
S06pplg1__u:87_4: sukhaṃ sarvasatvāś ca tasmin samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatā abhūvan* yad evaṃ jānaṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:88: sādhu dānaṃ sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu satyam /
S06pplg1__u:89: sādhv apramādaḥ sādhu maitrī sādhu karuṇā sādhv avihiṃsā prāṇibhūteṣu /
S06pplg1__u:90_0: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ
S06pplg1__u:90_1: sasumeruṃ sacakravāḍaṃ sadevabhavanaṃ sendrakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ savaśavartinaṃ saśuddhāvāsaṃ
S06pplg1__u:90_2: sadevadānavakāyam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā :
S06pplg1__u:91_0: tadyathāpi nāma balavān divākaraḥ pariśuddhe gaganatale paurṇamāsyāṃ vā candramaṇḍalam*
S06pplg1__u:91_1: evam eva bhagavān pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn abhibhūya dakṣiṇasyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:92_0: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn abhibhūya
S06pplg1__u:92_1: sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śriyā tadyathāpi nāma
S06pplg1__u:92_2: sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvāṃs tadanyān parvatān abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate /
S06pplg1__u:93: tadyathāpi nāma candramaṇḍalam* sarvāṇi tārārūpāṇy abhibhūya sthitaṃ śobhate bhāsati tapati virocate /
S06pplg1__u:94: tadyathāpi nāma sūryamaṇḍalaṃ sarvāṃs tadanyān avabhāsān abhibhūya sthitaṃ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate /
S06pplg1__u:95: evam eva bhagavān daśasu dikṣu sadevakaṃ sendrakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśuddhāvāsam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā :
S06pplg1__u:96: punar yādṛśaṃ bhagavataḥ prakṛtyātmabhāvopadarśanaṃ tādṛśam iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv upadarśayati sma /
S06pplg1__u:97_0: atha yāvanto 'smiṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devanikāyāḥ
S06pplg1__u:97_1: yāvad brahmakāyikā paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ tuṣitā yāmās trāyastriṃśāś
S06pplg1__u:97_2: cāturmahārājakāyikā devanikāyās te sarve siṃhāsananiṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:98_0: te tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā divyāni puṣpāṇy ādāya
S06pplg1__u:98_1: divyāni mālyāni divyān gandhān divyāni vilepanāni divyāni cūrṇāni divyān vāsān divyāny
S06pplg1__u:101: divyāni cchatrāṇi divyāṃ dhvajān* divyāḥ patākā gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:102: upasaṃkramya taiḥ puṣpādibhir yāvac chatradhvajapatākābhir bhagavantam avakiranti smābhyavakiranti
S06pplg1__u:104: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyā vineyā bhājanībhūtās te jalajasthalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramya tathāgatam abhipūjayaṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:105: (LPG 5r) sarvāṇi ca tāni puṣpādīni yāvac chatradhvajapatākā bhagavaty avakīrṇāni /
S06pplg1__u:106_1: upari vaihāyase mūrdhasandhau mahāpuṣpādikūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt* tataś ca kūṭāgārād
S06pplg1__u:106_2: divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni pralaṃbante sma pralaṃbante smābhipralaṃbante sma /
S06pplg1__u:107: taiś ca puṣpapaṭṭadāmābhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsenātyarthaṃ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate /
S06pplg1__u:108_0: yathā cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur evaṃ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl
S06pplg1__u:108_1: lokadhātavo 'vabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś cābhūvan* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām
S06pplg1__u:108_2: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātavo 'vabhāsitāḥ spuṭāś cābhūvan*
S06pplg1__u:108_3: tatra jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakadarśanam atmabhāvan dṛṣṭvaivam
S06pplg1__u:108_4: abhavat* asmākaṃ purataḥ tathāgato niṣaṇṇo dharman deśayatīti /
S06pplg1__u:109_0: yathā jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇām evaṃ godānīyānāṃ pūrvavidehakānām uttarakauravāṇāṃ
S06pplg1__u:109_1: cāturmahārajakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvad aghaniṣṭhānān devānāṃ evaṃ sāhasre lokadhātau
S06pplg1__u:109_2: dvisāhasre trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasatvānām etad abhūt* asmākaṃ puratas
S06pplg1__u:110_0: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva prabhāṃ prāmuṃcat* yayā prabhayā
S06pplg1__u:110_1: punar evāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsito 'bhūt* yenāvabhāsena ya
S06pplg1__u:110_2: iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06pplg1__u:110_3: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saśrāvakasaṃghān paśyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:111_0: tatra ca pūrvasyān diśi ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās te 'pīmaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06pplg1__u:111_1: lokadhātuṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ sabhikṣusaṃghaparivāram adrākṣur
S06pplg1__u:111_2: yathā ca pūrvasyān diśy evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ (LPG 5v)
S06pplg1__u:112_0: paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06pplg1__u:112_1: lokadhātuṣu satvās te 'pīmaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ
S06pplg1__u:113_0: atha pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātū
S06pplg1__u:113_1: ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate
S06pplg1__u:113_2: yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
S06pplg1__u:114_0: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ
S06pplg1__u:114_1: taṃ ca mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ taṃ ca tathāgatātmabhāvan dṛṣṭvā yena sa bhagavān ratnākaras
S06pplg1__u:114_2: tathāgatas tenopasaṃkrānta-r-upasaṃkramya taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnākaraṃ tathāgatam etad
S06pplg1__u:114_3: avocat* ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāyāsya
S06pplg1__u:114_4: ca mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya ayaṃ cedṛśas tathāgatakāyaḥ sandṛśyate /

S06pplg1__u:215: sarvapāpamitrapāpasahāyān vivarjayitukāmena sarvabuddhabodhisatvakalyāṇamitrāṇy ārāgayitukāmena sarvamāramārakāyikadevatān nirjetukāmena sarvāvaraṇīyāni viśodhayitukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:216: sarvadharmānāvaraṇatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:217: bodhisatvakulaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena buddhakulam ārāgayitukāmena triratnavaṃśānupacchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:218_0: kumārabhūmim anuprāptukāmena buddhabodhisatvair avirahitena bhavitukāmena bodhisatvabhūmīr
S06pplg1__u:218_1: atikrāntukāmena kṣipraṃ tathāgatabhūmīṃ paripūrayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
S06pplg1__u:219_0: yaiś ca kuśalamūlair yair ākārair ākāṃkṣed buddhān bhagavataḥ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ
S06pplg1__u:219_1: mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tāni me kuśalamūlāni ta ākārāḥ samṛddhyeyur iti bodhisatvena
S06pplg1__u:221_0: annena pānena yānair vastrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiḥ śayanair
S06pplg1__u:221_2: saṃtarpayiṣyāmīti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:222: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvāsatvās tān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:223_0: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu paṃcasv abhijñāsu triśaraṇagamane buddhadharmasaṃghaprasādapratilaṃbhe
S06pplg1__u:225: ye vā te gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās tān sarvān mahāyāne samādāpayitukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:227: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ekam api kuśalacittotpādam akṣayaṃ kartukāmena bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*//
S06pplg1__u:228_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā
S06pplg1__u:228_1: bhagavanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
S06pplg1__u:228_2: dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te me varṇaṃ bhāṣerann
S06pplg1__u:229_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāni pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi
S06pplg1__u:229_1: tāni sarvāṇy ekacittotpādenopasaṃkrāntukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:230_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu
S06pplg1__u:231: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ekasvaraghoṣeṇa pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vijñapayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:232_0: evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu
S06pplg1__u:232_1: gaṃgānadīvālikopamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi vijñapayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:233_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra buddhotpādānupacchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvakulam
S06pplg1__u:233_1: ārakṣitukāmena buddhavaṃśānucchedāya sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:247: abhāvasvabhāvaśunyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:249: tathākāralakṣaṇāny avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:250: sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatām avitathatām ananyatathatām avikāratathatāṃ yathāvattathātam avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:251: sarvadharmāṇān dharmadhātum avaboddhukāmena sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhūtakoṭim avaboddhukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:252: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantyas tṛsāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau gaṃgānadīvālukās tāḥ sarvā jñātukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:253_0: yas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahāsamudreṣv apskandho nadīṣu mahānadīṣu kunadīṣūtsasarastaḍākeṣu
S06pplg1__u:253_1: palvaleṣu tan sarvaṃ śatadhābhinnayā bālāgrakoṭyābhyutkṣeptukāmena na ca tanniśṛtān
S06pplg1__u:255_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvāṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv agniskandhaḥ
S06pplg1__u:255_1: sa sarva ekajvālībhūto bhavet tadyathāpi nāma kalpoddāhe vartamāne tam enam ekena
S06pplg1__u:255_2: mukhavāyunā nirvāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:256_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yās trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau bātamaṇḍalyo yā
S06pplg1__u:256_1: imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vidhunuyur vikireyur vidhvaṃseyus tadyathāpi
S06pplg1__u:256_2: nāma busamuṣṭin tāḥ sarvā ekenāṅgulyāḥ prāntakena saṃcchādayitukāmena viṣkaṃbhayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:257: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv ākāśadhātus taṃ sarvam ekaparyaṃkena spharitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:258_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ
S06pplg1__u:258_1: parvatarājās tān sarvān ekabālena badhvābhyutkṣipyāprameyān asaṃkhyeyāl lokadhātūn
S06pplg1__u:258_2: kṣipeyam iti tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:259_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvāṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tṛṇavṛkṣagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo
S06pplg1__u:260_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06pplg1__u:260_1: buddhā bhagavantaḥ sabodhisatvāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās tān sarvān ekapiṇḍapātena pratipādayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:261: samyaksaṃbuddhān sabodhisatvān saśrāvakasaṃghān satkartukāmena gurukartukāmena mānayitukāmena pūjayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:262_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
S06pplg1__u:262_1: dikṣv aikaikasyān diśi ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantaḥ sabodhisatvāḥ
S06pplg1__u:263_0: tan sarvāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān sabodhisatvān saśrāvakasaṃghān satkartukāmena
S06pplg1__u:263_1: gurukartukāmena mānayitukāmena pūjayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:264_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās
S06pplg1__u:264_1: tān sarvāṃc chīlaskandhe pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmenaivaṃ samādhiskandhe prajñāskandhe vimuktiskandhe
S06pplg1__u:264_3: sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
S06pplg1__u:265: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās tān sarvāṃc chīlaskandhe /
S06pplg1__u:267_1: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena sakṛdāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau yāvad anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
S06pplg1__u:268_0: (LPG 12v) punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvanto daśadigloke sarvalokadhātuṣu satvās
S06pplg1__u:268_1: tān sarvāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānena ca parinirvāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
S06pplg1__u:269_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ
S06pplg1__u:269_1: dadatā evaṃ śikṣitavyam* yad evaṃ dānaṃ datvā mahāphalaṃ bhavaty evaṃ dānaṃ datvā
S06pplg1__u:272: evaṃ dānaṃ datvā tad eva dānaṃ niśrāya cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
S06pplg1__u:273: evaṃ trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
S06pplg1__u:274: evaṃ dānaṃ datvā tad evaṃ dānaṃ niśrāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyaṃ tritīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam utpādyate ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate /
S06pplg1__u:275: vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattim ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate evaṃ dānaṃ datvāryāṣṭāṃgo mārga utpādyate /
S06pplg1__u:280: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ jānāty evam upāyakauśalyena dānaṃ dattaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati /
S06pplg1__u:281: evaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati /
S06pplg1__u:282: athāyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dānaṃ dadatā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:286: dānasya dāyakasya parigrāhakasya trimaṇḍalapariśuddhyā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:292: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputrātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām sarvabuddhaguṇān prajñātukāmenānuprāptukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:293: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pāraṃgaṃtukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:294: evaṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ laukikalokottarāṇāṃ rūpyarūpiṇāṃ vyākṛtāvyākṛtānāṃ niyatāniyatānāṃ nairyāṇikānairyāṇikānām /
S06pplg1__u:295: hānabhāgīyānāṃ viśeṣabhāgīyānāṃ pṛthagjānadharmāṇāṃ āryadharmāṇāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ bodhisatvadharmāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ /
S06pplg1__u:296: sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃgaṃtukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:297: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatām anuboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ //
S06pplg1__u:298: sarvadharmāṇām anutpādakoṭim anuprāptukāmena bhūtakoṭiṃ prativeddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:299: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pūrvaṃgamena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:300: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām upasthāyakena (LPG 13v)
S06pplg1__u:302: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhānāṃ bhagavatām abhyantaraparivāreṇa bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:303: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena mahāparivāreṇa bhavatukāmena bodhisatvaparivāraṃ pratilabdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:304: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvadātrīṇāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:305_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dāne 'navagṛhītacittena bhavitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:305_1: dauḥśīlyacittaṃ pṛthakkartukāmena vyāpādacittam utsraṣṭukāmena kausīdyacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam
S06pplg1__u:306_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvasattvān dānamaye puṇyakṛyāvastuni
S06pplg1__u:307: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākārāṇi paṃca cakṣuṃṣi niṣpādayitukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:308: māṃsacakṣur divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur niṣpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
S06pplg1__u:309: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ (LPG 14r)
S06pplg1__u:310_0: paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi
S06pplg1__u:310_1: gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tān sarvān divyena cakṣuṣā draṣṭukāmena
S06pplg1__u:310_2: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śrotukāmena
S06pplg1__u:310_3: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñātukāmena /
S06pplg1__u:311_0: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvayogasahagatāṃ bodhisatvacaryām anusmartukāmena
S06pplg1__u:311_1: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anekavidham ṛddhividhivikurvitaṃ saṃdraṣṭukāmena bodhisatvena
S06pplg1__u:312_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yan te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samantād
S06pplg1__u:312_1: daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ śrutvānācchedyena
S06pplg1__u:312_2: smṛtibalādhānena sandhārayitukāmena yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha
S06pplg1__u:312_3: etasminn antare sarvam avipraṇāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:313_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ
S06pplg1__u:313_1: bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhīś ca pariniṣpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:314_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcit tathāgatena bhāṣitaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ
S06pplg1__u:314_2: tat sarvaṃ paryavāptukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:315_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcit pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu
S06pplg1__u:315_1: sarvabuddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām
S06pplg1__u:315_2: uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu yat kiṃcit sarvabuddhair
S06pplg1__u:315_3: bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate tat sarvaṃ śrotukāmenodgrahītukāmena (LPG 14v)
S06pplg1__u:316: dhārayitukāmena paryavāptukāmena pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena tatra ca tathatvāya pratipattukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:317_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv
S06pplg1__u:317_1: andhākāratamisrā lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭāḥ yatremau sūryācandramasāv evaṃ maharddhikāv
S06pplg1__u:317_2: evaṃ maheśākhyāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau na bhāsete na tapato na virocete tāḥ sarvāḥ avabhāsayitukāmena
S06pplg1__u:318_0: evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu
S06pplg1__u:318_1: dikṣu yā andhākāratamisrās tāḥ sarvā avabhāsayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
S06pplg1__u:319_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo
S06pplg1__u:319_1: yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdas tatra lokadhātuṣu tān sarvasatvān
S06pplg1__u:320: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu : //
S06pplg1__u:321_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād
S06pplg1__u:321_1: upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv
S06pplg1__u:321_2: andhāḥ satvās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanti badhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdāṃ
S06pplg1__u:328_0: kim iti (LPG 15r) ye tatra samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06pplg1__u:328_1: lokadhātuṣv akṣaṇāpāyagatāḥ satvā nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā te
S06pplg1__u:328_2: mamānubhāvena tataś cyavitvā mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilapsyante /
S06pplg1__u:329_0: sarvāṃś ca tān satvāṃc chīle pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane
S06pplg1__u:329_1: pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau
S06pplg1__u:329_2: yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena
S06pplg1__u:330: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena tathāgateryāpathaṃ śikṣitukāmena tathāgatacaryācāritraviśuddhiṃ tathāgatasya
S06pplg1__u:332_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
S06pplg1__u:332_1: vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ nāgāvalokitam avalokayeyaṃ kim ity ahaṃ mahāsiṃhavijṛṃbhitena
S06pplg1__u:332_2: vijṛmbheyaṃ kim ity aham amoghavikrāmitayā vikrāmeyaṃ kim ity ahaṃ caturaṃgulamātreṇa
S06pplg1__u:333: kim ity ahaṃ sahasrapatreṣu pādmeṣu pādatalau nikṣipan gaccheyaṃ pādatalasanniśṛtān prāṇino aviheṭhayan* kim ity ahaṃ sahasrāracakratalābhyāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ vicitrayan gaccheyam //
S06pplg1__u:334: kim ity ahaṃ samantāc cakrapramāṇamātraṃ mahāpṛthivyāḥ parivartayeyaṃ caṃkrame caṃkramyeya kim ity ahaṃ sarvāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anucaṃkramyamāṇaḥ pṛthivīrajasā nānulipyeya /
S06pplg1__u:335: kim iti me ekaṃ vā yojanaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā /
S06pplg1__u:336: paṃca vā daśa vā viṃśatir vā tṛṃśad vā catvāriṃśad vā paṃcāśad vā yojanaśataṃ vā /
S06pplg1__u:339: aprameyāṇi vā asaṃkhyeyāni vā acintyāni vā /
S06pplg1__u:342: amāpyāni vā buddhakṣetrāṇy anuvicarato 'nucaṃkramyamāṇasya na kāyaklame na cittam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:343_0: kim ity aham adhastāt kramatalayoḥ sahasrārābhyāṃ cakrabhyāṃ raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S06pplg1__u:343_1: pramuṃcan* sarvākṣaṇāpāyaduḥkhāni praśamayya sarvasatvān sukhitān kuryām iti bodhisatvena
S06pplg1__u:344_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
S06pplg1__u:344_1: vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ caturmahārājakāyikair devair yāvad akaniṣṭhair anekair
S06pplg1__u:344_2: devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto bodhimaṇḍam upasaṃkrameyam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:345: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam* /
S06pplg1__u:346: kim iti me bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣīdataś cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devā duṣyasaṃstaraṃ kuryur iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:347_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
S06pplg1__u:347_1: vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchato
S06pplg1__u:347_2: niṣaṇṇasya śayānasya sa pṛthivīpradeśo vajramayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheta /
S06pplg1__u:349_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivam
S06pplg1__u:349_1: upaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ yatraiva divase 'bhiniṣkrameyaṃ tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ
S06pplg1__u:349_2: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tatraiva divase dharmacakraṃ pravartayeyaṃ pravartayataś
S06pplg1__u:349_3: cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśudhyet*
S06pplg1__u:350: bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:351_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ
S06pplg1__u:351_1: cittam utpādayitavyam* kim ity me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyaḥ
S06pplg1__u:351_2: śrāvakasaṃgho bhavet* ekadharmadeśanayāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā ekāsanikā arhanto bhaveyur
S06pplg1__u:351_3: bodhisatvā mahāsatvā sarve avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:352_0: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇo bodhisatvasaṃgho bhavet* amitaṃ cāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhavet* amitā
S06pplg1__u:352_1: prabhāsaṃpad bhaved iti prajñāpāmitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06pplg1__u:352_2: abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohaśabdo 'pi na bhaved iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:353: sarvasatvā evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ sādhu dānaṃ sādhu damaḥ sādhu brahmacaryaṃ sādhv avihiṃsā sarvaprāṇibhūteṣu /
S06pplg1__u:354: kiṃ me parinirvṛtasya saddharmāntardhānaśabdo 'pi na bhavet tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:355: kim iti me saha śravaṇamātreṇa nāmadheyasya gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvā niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:356: tena śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
S06pplg1__u:357: yasmiṃc chāradvatīputra samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān guṇān utpādayati /
S06pplg1__u:358: tasmin samaye āttamanaskā bhavaṃti catvāro mahārājā vayam atra catvāri pātrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmo yāni paurvakair mahārājaiḥ paurvakeṣu tathāgateṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
S06pplg1__u:359: āttamanaskā bhavanti trāyastriṃśā devā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ āttamanaskā bhavanti paranirmitavaśavartino devā vayam asyopasthānaparicaryāṃ (LPG 16v)
S06pplg1__u:360: kariṣyāma evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ parihāsyaṃte divyāḥ kāyā abhivardhiṣyante / //
S06pplg1__u:362_0: āttamanaskā bhavanti brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā śubhakṛtsnā bṛhatphalā avṛhā atapāḥ
S06pplg1__u:362_1: sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā āttamanaskā bhavanti aghaniṣṭhā devā vayam enam adhyeṣiṣyāmahe
S06pplg1__u:363_0: yasmin samaye śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate
S06pplg1__u:363_1: ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir āttamanaskās tasmin* samaye bhavanti kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
S06pplg1__u:363_2: ca vayam asya mahāsatvasya mātāpitarau bhaviṣyāmo //
S06pplg1__u:365_0: āttamanaskā bhavanti catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devā bodhisatvasyāmaithunasaṃyogaprasthānatāyai
S06pplg1__u:365_1: sa punar brahmacārī bhavati satvānāṃ bodhiniyojanatāyai na saṃyojanīyair dharmaiḥ
S06pplg1__u:367: tat kasya hetoḥ kāmāṃ khalu punaḥ pratiṣevamāṇasya brahmalokopapattaye-r-antarāyo bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:370: tasmāt tarhi bodhisatvena mahāsatvena brahmacāriṇaivābhiniṣkramyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā nābrahmacāriṇā : //
S06pplg1__u:371: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kiṃ punar bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyāvaśyaṃ bhāryaputraduhitṛbhir bhavitavyam* bhagavān āha /
S06pplg1__u:372_0: keṣāṃcic chāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām avaśyaṃ mātāpitṛbhir bhavitavyam*
S06pplg1__u:372_1: na bhāryāputraduhitṛbhiḥ keṣāṃcid avaśyaṃ mātāpitṛbhāryāputraduhitribhir bhavitavyam*
S06pplg1__u:372_2: keṣāṃcic chāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya brahmacaryaṃsamādānaṃ bhavati (LPG 17r)
S06pplg1__u:373_0: te nityaṃ kumārabhūtā eva yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante kecit
S06pplg1__u:373_1: punaḥ bodhisatvā mahāsatvā upāyakauśalyena satvaparipākāya paṃca kāmaguṇān paribhuṃjyānuttarāṃ
S06pplg1__u:374: kecit punaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāpratilabdhā apagatakāmakleśās te satvaparipākāya kāmaguṇaparibhogaṃ cotpādayanti na ca paribhuṃjante / //
S06pplg1__u:376_0: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā suśikṣito māyāvidyāsamyogajñāne
S06pplg1__u:376_1: sa paṃca kāmaguṇān abhinirmāya taiḥ paṃcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ramamāṇaṃ krīḍantaṃ paricārayaṃtam
S06pplg1__u:376_2: ātmānam upadarśayet* tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu tena māyākāreṇa vā māyākārāntevāsinā
S06pplg1__u:376_3: vā paṃca kāmāmaguṇāḥ paribhuktā bhaveyur āha /
S06pplg1__u:378_0: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā mahāyānamāyāsuśikṣitā māyopamadharmatāvihārapratilabdhāḥ
S06pplg1__u:379: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasanti na lipyaṃte anena paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ kāmānām avarṇaṃ bhāṣante /
S06pplg1__u:380_0: ādīptāḥ kāmā jugupsitāḥ kāmā vadhakāḥ kāmāḥ pratyarthikāḥ kāmāḥ pratyamitrāḥ kāmāḥ
S06pplg1__u:380_1: evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ satvānāṃ paṃcabhyaḥ kāmaguṇebhyo vivecanārthaṃ
S06pplg1__u:381: na ca tair mādyanti na pramādyanti /
S06pplg1__u:385: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatiputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam* bhagavān āha /
S06pplg1__u:386: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisatva iti na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:394: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam api na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:395_0: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa bodhisatvo nāmasvabhāvena śunyaḥ na śunyatayā rūpaṃ śunyaṃ
S06pplg1__u:395_1: na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā na śunyatayā vijñānaṃ śunyam* nānyatra rūpāc chunyatā nānyatra
S06pplg1__u:395_2: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānāc chunyatā /
S06pplg1__u:396_0: śunyataiva rūpaṃ śunyataiva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ śunyataiva vijñānaṃ tat kasya
S06pplg1__u:396_1: hetoḥ tathā hi nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhiḥ nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisatvaḥ
S06pplg1__u:397: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ /
S06pplg1__u:398: tathā hi māyopamaṃ rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā māyopamaṃ vijñānaṃ māyā ca nāmamātraṃ na deśasthā na pradeśasthā :
S06pplg1__u:399_0: asad abhūtaṃ vitathasamaṃ māyādarśanaṃ svabhāvarahitaṃ asvabhāvaś cānutpādaḥ anirodaḥ
S06pplg1__u:399_1: na hānir na vṛddhiḥ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam evaṃ caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utpādaṃ na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:407: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:408: bodhir iti bodhisatva iti yad ucyate tad api na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:409: tat kasya hetoḥ kṛtriman nāma pratipratidharman te kalpitā āgantukena nāmadheyenābhūtaparikalpitena vyavahṛyante //
S06pplg1__u:411: tad bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na manyate /
S06pplg1__u:413: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ vyupaparīkṣate /
S06pplg1__u:414: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisatva iti nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhir iti /
S06pplg1__u:415: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddha iti /
S06pplg1__u:417: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti /
S06pplg1__u:418: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpam iti /
S06pplg1__u:420: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ātmātmeti vyavahṛyate sa ca parigaveṣyamāṇo nopalabhyate /
S06pplg1__u:421_0: evaṃ satvo jīvaḥ poṣaḥ pudgalo manujo mānavaḥ kārakaḥ kārāpako vedako vedayitṛkaḥ
S06pplg1__u:421_1: utthāpakaḥ samutthāpako jānakaḥ paśyakaḥ sparśako vijānakaḥ sarva ete yathābhūtaṃ
S06pplg1__u:425: evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisatvan na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:431: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānan na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:433_0: tad api nāmaṃ na samanupaśyaty evaṃ caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:433_1: tathāgataprajñāṃ sthāpayitvā sarvās tadanyāḥ prajñā yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06pplg1__u:434: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa tad api na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:435_0: yenābhiniviśeta evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputrāyaṃ jaṃbudvīpaḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair
S06pplg1__u:435_1: bhikṣubhiḥ tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravaṇaṃ vā śālivanaṃ
S06pplg1__u:435_2: vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ
S06pplg1__u:439: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate /
S06pplg1__u:440: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya yā prajñā sā sarvasatvānāṃ parinirvāpaṇārthāya pratyupasthitā //
S06pplg1__u:441: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yā ekadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā abhibhūya tiṣṭhati //
S06pplg1__u:442_1: bhikṣubhiḥ sacec chāradvatīputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇo bhaved
S06pplg1__u:442_2: yuṣmādṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:442_3: carataḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate //
S06pplg1__u:443_0: tiṣṭhatu śāradvatīputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sacec chāradvatīputra pūrvasyān
S06pplg1__u:443_1: diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair
S06pplg1__u:443_2: bhikṣubhiḥ evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād
S06pplg1__u:443_3: daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ
S06pplg1__u:443_4: teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitāyāḥ (LPG 19r)
S06pplg1__u:444: prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate /
S06pplg1__u:446_0: yeyaṃ bhagavaṃc chrāvakāṇāṃ prajñā srotaāpannasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāminaḥ arhataḥ
S06pplg1__u:446_1: yā ca pratyekabuddhasya bodhisatvasya tathāgatasya cārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya prajñā
S06pplg1__u:446_2: sarvās tāḥ prajñā abhedaḥ śunyatā viviktāḥ anutpādaprakṛtikāḥ svabhāvaśunyā na ca
S06pplg1__u:446_3: bhagavann abhedasya viviktasyānutpādasya svabhāvaśunyasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vopalabhyate /
S06pplg1__u:447: tat kathaṃ bhagavan yeyaṃ bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaikadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām abhibhavati / //
S06pplg1__u:450_0: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputra yena kāryeṇa bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:450_1: carataḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā pratyupasthitā mayā mārgākārajñatāyāṃ caratā
S06pplg1__u:450_2: sarvasatvānām arthaṃ kurvatā sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbudhya sarvasatvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā
S06pplg1__u:450_3: api nu tena kṛtyena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pratyupasthitā /
S06pplg1__u:453_0: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavaty asmābhir
S06pplg1__u:453_1: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasatvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyā āha /
S06pplg1__u:455_0: tad anenāpi te śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam* yeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06pplg1__u:455_1: prajñā yā ca bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñā imāṃ prajñām upanidhāyaiṣā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ
S06pplg1__u:457_0: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavati vayaṃ
S06pplg1__u:457_1: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni
S06pplg1__u:457_2: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06pplg1__u:458: abhisaṃbuddhyāparimāṇān aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti āha /
S06pplg1__u:461_0: mayā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni
S06pplg1__u:461_1: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06pplg1__u:462_0: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra khadyotakasya prāṇikajātasya naivaṃ bhavaty aham ābhayā
S06pplg1__u:462_1: jambudvīpam avabhāsayeyaṃ mamābhayā jambudvīpaḥ sphuṭo bhavet* evam eva śāradvatīputra
S06pplg1__u:462_2: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā yāvad
S06pplg1__u:463: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra sūryamaṇḍalam udāgacchat sarvajaṃbūdvīpam avabhāsena spharati /
S06pplg1__u:464_0: sarvajambudvīpam avabhāsena sphuṭīkaroti evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ
S06pplg1__u:464_1: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni
S06pplg1__u:464_2: paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān
S06pplg1__u:465: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikramyāvaivartikabhūmīm anuprāpnoti /
S06pplg1__u:468_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat* iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo
S06pplg1__u:468_1: mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃc chunyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu (LPG 20r)
S06pplg1__u:469: dharmeṣu sthitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikramya buddhabhūmim anuprāpnoti / //
S06pplg1__u:472: katamasyāṃ bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:474_0: prathamacittotpādaṃ śāradvatīputropādāya bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran
S06pplg1__u:474_1: yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaḥ atrāntarād bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām
S06pplg1__u:474_2: agro vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya
S06pplg1__u:474_3: sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:475_0: yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ paṃcānāṃ śikṣāpadānām aṣṭāṃgasamanvāgatasya
S06pplg1__u:475_1: poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ paṃcānām
S06pplg1__u:475_2: abhijñānāṃ ṣaṇṇām anusmṛtīnāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ
S06pplg1__u:475_3: caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ paṃcānām indriyāṇāṃ paṃcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṃgānām
S06pplg1__u:477: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:478: eṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:479: eṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvāt* kṣatriyamahāsālakulāni prajñāyante /
S06pplg1__u:481: cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikā devā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante / //
S06pplg1__u:484: srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisatvās tathāgatā 'rhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante / //
S06pplg1__u:487: tat kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisatvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati bhagavān āha /
S06pplg1__u:488: (LPG 20v) paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati /
S06pplg1__u:489: tat kasya hetoḥ atyantapariśuddhā śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dakṣiṇā /
S06pplg1__u:490: tathā hi dāyakaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kasya dāyakaḥ anekeṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ /
S06pplg1__u:492: kathaṃ yujyamāno bhagavan bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti veditavyaḥ bhagavān āha /
S06pplg1__u:493: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo rūpaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ vedanāśunyatāyāṃ saṃjñāśunyatāyāṃ saṃskāraśunyatāyāṃ vijñānaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:494_0: punar aparaṃ cakṣuḥśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:494_1: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta
S06pplg1__u:494_3: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ śrotradhātuśunyatāyāṃ śabdadhātuśunyatāyāṃ śrotravijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:494_7: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ duḥkhaśunyatāyāṃ samudayaśunyatāyāṃ nirodhaśunyatāyāṃ mārgaśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:494_8: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ skandhaśunyatāyāṃ dhātuśunyatāyāṃ āyatanaśunyatāyāṃ yukto
S06pplg1__u:494_9: yukta iti vaktavyaḥ avidyāśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ saṃskāraśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:495_1: bhavaśunyatāyāṃ jātiśunyatāyāṃ jarāmaraṇaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sarvadharmaśunyatāyām
S06pplg1__u:496: ye kecit saṃjñāgatāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:497_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśunyatāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:497_1: yukto yukta iti vaktavya evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:498_0: sa ābhir daśabhiḥ śunyatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tāvad yukta iti vā ayukta
S06pplg1__u:498_1: iti vā vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:499: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:500: na rūpam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:501: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:502: na rūpaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:503: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:504: na rūpaṃ vedanayā sārdhaṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:505: na vedanā saṃjñayā na saṃjñā saṃskārair na saṃskārā vijñānena sārdhaṃ samavasarantīti samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:506: na vijñānaṃ saṃskāraiḥ sārdhaṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:507: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi na sa kaścid dharmaḥ kenacid dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ samavasarati na visarati / //
S06pplg1__u:509: na yujyate na viyujyate prakṛtiśunyatām upādāya /
S06pplg1__u:510: yā śāradvatīputra rūpaśunyatā na sā rūpaṃ yā vedanāśunyatā na sā vedanā /
S06pplg1__u:514: tathā hi śāradvatīputra yā rūpaśunyatā na sā rūpayati /
S06pplg1__u:519: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi śāradvatīputrānyad rūpam anyā śunyatā nānyā śunyatānyad rūpam* rūpam eva śunyatā śunyataiva rūpam* evaṃ nānyā vedanānyā śunyatā /
S06pplg1__u:525: yā śāradvatīputra śunyatā na sā utpadyate na nirudhyate /
S06pplg1__u:528: nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā yā notpadyate na nirudhyate /
S06pplg1__u:532_0: na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na cakṣur na śrotraṃ na
S06pplg1__u:532_1: ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā kāyo na manaḥ na rūpaṃ na śabdo na gandho na raso na sparśo na dharmāḥ
S06pplg1__u:532_2: na tatra skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na tatra cakṣurdhātur na rūpadhātur na cakṣurvijñānadhātur
S06pplg1__u:532_3: na śrotradhātur na śabdadhātur na śrotravijñānadhātuḥ na ghrāṇadhātur na gandhadhātur
S06pplg1__u:532_4: na ghrāṇavijñānadhātur na jihvādhātur na rasadhātur na jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ na kāyadhātur
S06pplg1__u:532_5: na spraṣṭavyadhātur na kāyavijñānadhātur na manodhātur na dharmadhātur na manovijñānadhātur
S06pplg1__u:532_6: na tatrāvidyā nāvidyānirodhaḥ na saṃskārā nna saṃskāranirodhaḥ na vijñānaṃ na vijñānanirodhaḥ
S06pplg1__u:532_7: na nāmarūpaṃ na nāmarūpanirodhaḥ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ na sparśo na
S06pplg1__u:532_8: sparśanirodhaḥ na vedanā na vedanānirodhaḥ na tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ nopādānaṃ nopādānanirodhaḥ
S06pplg1__u:532_9: na bhavo na bhavanirodhaḥ na jātir na jātinirodhaḥ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na jarāmaraṇanirodhaḥ
S06pplg1__u:532_10: na duḥkhaṃ na samudayo na nirodho na mārgaḥ na prāptir nābhisamayaḥ na srotaāpanno
S06pplg1__u:533_0: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmī nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhan nārhatvam* na pratyekabodhir na
S06pplg1__u:533_1: pratyekabuddhaḥ na tatra mārgākārajñatā na bodhisatvaḥ na tatra bodhir na buddhaḥ
S06pplg1__u:533_2: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti
S06pplg1__u:533_3: vaktavyaḥ sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta
S06pplg1__u:534: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:535: na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:536: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:537: na cakṣur yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:538: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyaṃ na mano yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:539: na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:540: na śabdaṃ na gandhaṃ na rasaṃ na sparśaṃ na dharmān na cakṣurdhātuṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:541: na rūpadhātuṃ na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ yāvan na manodhātuṃ na dharmadhātuṃ na manovijñānadhātuṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:542: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:543: na samyakprahāṇeṣu na riddhipādeṣu nendriyeṣu na baleṣu na bodhyaṃgeṣu na mārge yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:544: yāvan na daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu na caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu na catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu nāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:545: yāvan na sarvajñatāyāṃ na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:546: anenāpi śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sarvadharmāyogāviyogatām (LPG 22v) upādāya /
S06pplg1__u:547: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śunyatāṃ śunyatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:548: na śunyatāyogam* nānimittam ānimittena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:549: nānimittayogam* nāpraṇihitam apraṇihitena yojayati na viyojayati
S06pplg1__u:551_0: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śunyatā na yogo na viyogaḥ evam ānimittam apraṇihitaṃ na
S06pplg1__u:551_1: yogo na viyogaḥ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
S06pplg1__u:552: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśunyatām avatarati /
S06pplg1__u:553: evam avataran na rūpaṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:554: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:555: na rūpaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:556: tathā hi pūrvāntam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:557: na rūpam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:558: tathā hy aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:559: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:560: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:561: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannair yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:562: tathā hi pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannāny eva na samanupaśyati / //
S06pplg1__u:563: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na pūrvāntam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:565: na pratyutpannaṃ pūrvāntenāparāntena vā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:566: na pūrvāntam aparāntaṃ vā pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:569: evaṃ hi yuktaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ (LPG 23r)
S06pplg1__u:571: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ yujyate yathā yujyamāno na sarvajñatām atītena yojayati tathā hy atītam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:575: tathā hy anāgatam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatām anāgatena yojayiṣyati /
S06pplg1__u:577: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatāṃ pratyutpannena yojayiṣyati /
S06pplg1__u:578: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:579_0: punar aparaṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ
S06pplg1__u:579_1: sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan
S06pplg1__u:581: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:582: tathā hi vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:583: yāvan na cakṣuḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:584: tathā hi cakṣur eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:585: evan na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyan na manaḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:586: tathā hi mana eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:587: evaṃ na rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:588: tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:589: evaṃ na śabdagandharasasparśadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:590: tathā hi dharmān eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:591: evaṃ na skandhān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:592: (LPG 23v) tathā hi skandhān eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:593: na dhātūn sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:594: tathā hi dhātūn eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:596: tathā hy āyatanāny eva na samanupaśyati / //
S06pplg1__u:598: na cakṣurdhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:599: tathā hi cakṣurdhātum eva na samanupaśyati / //
S06pplg1__u:601: na rūpadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:602: tathā hi rūpadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:603: na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:604: tathā hi cakṣurvijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:605: yāvan na manodhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:606: tathā hi manodhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:607: na dharmadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:608: tathā hi dharmadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:609: na manovijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:610: tathā hi manovijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:612: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatiputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:613: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:614: tathā hi dānapāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:615: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāṃ na vīryapāramitāṃ na dhyānapāramitāṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:616: tathā hi prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:617: evaṃ na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇardhipādendriyabalabodhyaṃgamārgān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:618: evan na daśa tathāgatabalāni na catvāri vaiśāradyāni na catasraḥ pratisaṃvida (LPG 24r)
S06pplg1__u:619: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:620: tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:621: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:622: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na buddhaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:623: na sarvajñatāṃ buddhena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:624: tathā hi buddham eva na samanupaśyati sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:625: na bodhiṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:626: na boddhyā sarvajñatāṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:627: tathā hi bodhim eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:628: sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:629: evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:630: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ bhāva iti yojayati na rūpaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:631: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na vijñānaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati / //
S06pplg1__u:634: na rūpam anityam iti yojayati evan na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nityam iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:635: na vijñānam anityam iti yojayati na rūpaṃ sukham iti yojayati na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:636: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sukham iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:640: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam ātmeti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:644: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti (LPG 24v) yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:646: na rūpaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:647: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:648: na rūpaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:649: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:650: na rūpaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:651: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:652: na rūpam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyata iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:653: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyaya iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:656: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannam iti yujyate evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam atītam iti yujyate na vijñānam anāgatam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:658: na rūpaṃ sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:659: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:660: na rūpam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate /
S06pplg1__u:661: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate /
S06pplg1__u:664: caratīti ca na carati ceti nopaiti /
S06pplg1__u:665: naiva carati ca na caratīti nopaiti /
S06pplg1__u:666: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:667: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:668: na dānapāramitāyā na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:670: na satvaparipākahetoḥ na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ na daśānāṃ (LPG 25r)
S06pplg1__u:674: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:677: na śunyatāśunyatāyā na mahāśunyatāyā na paramārthaśunyatāyā na saṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nāsaṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nātyantaśunyatāyā /
S06pplg1__u:686: na dharmadhātor na bhūtakoṭeḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:687: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya bhedaṃ vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:688: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:689: sa na divyasya cakṣuṣaḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:690: na divyasya śrotrasya na paracittajñānasya na pūrvanivāsānusmṛter nardhipādānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:691: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:692_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ
S06pplg1__u:692_1: bhavaty aham ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06pplg1__u:692_2: lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi //
S06pplg1__u:693_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv
S06pplg1__u:693_1: ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi
S06pplg1__u:694: bhavati yat te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante tat sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śroṣyāmi /
S06pplg1__u:695: ahaṃ tatra lokadhātuṣu satvānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ jñāsye /
S06pplg1__u:697: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā tāṃ satvāṃś cyavamānān upapadyamānān upapannāṃś ca drakṣyāmi /
S06pplg1__u:700: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:701: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ na labhate /
S06pplg1__u:702: yāny api kānicil laukikalokottarāṇi karaṇīyāni tāny api sarvāṇi pradakṣiṇībhavanty anābhogenāparikalpitāni //
S06pplg1__u:703_0: ye ca te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto ye ca
S06pplg1__u:703_1: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv
S06pplg1__u:703_2: ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi buddhā
S06pplg1__u:703_3: bhagavantas taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam ārakṣanti mā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pated iti /
S06pplg1__u:704_0: ye ca catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvamm
S06pplg1__u:704_1: ārakṣanti mā haiva kaścid bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyāntarāyaṃ kārṣīt* ye ca kecit
S06pplg1__u:704_2: kāyikā rogās te 'pi tasya dṛṣṭe 'pi dharme sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavanti /
S06pplg1__u:705: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvān maitryā spharati / //
S06pplg1__u:707: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:708: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ alpakṛcchreṇa dhāraṇīmukha samādhimukhāni pratibhānapratisaṃvinmukhāny āmukhībhavanti /
S06pplg1__u:711: taiś ca buddhair bhagavadbhir na kadācid virahito bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:713: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:714: asti kaścid dharmo yo dharmaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
S06pplg1__u:717: tathā hi sa tad dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:720: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:721_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ
S06pplg1__u:721_1: bhavati * kaccid ahaṃ dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddhyeya na vābhisaṃbudhyeya tat kasya
S06pplg1__u:721_2: hetor na hi dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddho nābhisaṃbudhyate /
S06pplg1__u:723: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:724: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃcid dharmaṃ dharmadhātuvyatiriktaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:725: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:726: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dharmadhātor dharmāṇāṃ ca nānākaraṇaṃ karoti / //
S06pplg1__u:727: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati //
S06pplg1__u:728: dharmadhātuṃ pratividhyeya vā na vā pratividhyeya /
S06pplg1__u:729: tathā hi sa na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:730: yena dharmeṇa yo dharmaḥ pratividhyeta tathā hi na sa dharmadhātuṃ śunyam iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:732: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:733: (LPG 26v) punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cakṣurdhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:739: evaṃ na śrotradhātuṃ na śabdadhātuṃ na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ na ghrāṇadhātuṃ na gandhadhātuṃ na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ na jihvādhātuṃ na rasadhātuṃ na jihvāvijñānadhātum /
S06pplg1__u:748: eṣa hi śāradvatīputra paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ śunyatāyāṃ śāradvatīputra caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati /
S06pplg1__u:751: kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ye kecic chāradvatīputra yogāḥ prajñāpāramitāyogas teṣām agrya-m-ākhyāyate /
S06pplg1__u:752: śreṣṭha varaḥ pravaraḥ praṇīta-m-ākhyāyate tat kasya hetoḥ anuttara eṣa yogo yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogaḥ śunyatānimittāpraṇihitayoga /
S06pplg1__u:753: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyākṛto vaktavyaḥ asannibhūtaś cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ (LPG 27r)
S06pplg1__u:754_0: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāmm arthaṃ karoti
S06pplg1__u:754_1: na cāsyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yujye 'ti vā viyujye 'ti vā māṃ buddhā
S06pplg1__u:756: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣye / //
S06pplg1__u:758: tat kasya hetos tathā hi sa dharmadhātuṃ na vyatirekīkaroti / //
S06pplg1__u:760: na ca dharmadhātoḥ kaṃcid anyadharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:761: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cared yo vā buddhair bhagavadbhir vyākṛyeta /
S06pplg1__u:763: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na satvasaṃjñotpadyate /
S06pplg1__u:764: na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā na jānakapaśyakakārakavedakasaṃjñotpadyate / //
S06pplg1__u:766: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy atyantaṃ satvo nopalabhyate na nirudhyate /
S06pplg1__u:767: na hi satvasyotpādo na nirodhaḥ yasya ca notpādo na nirodhaḥ kathaṃ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati /
S06pplg1__u:768: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ satvānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:772_0: eṣa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ ayaṃ
S06pplg1__u:772_1: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ paramo yogaḥ
S06pplg1__u:773: atra ca śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo mahāmaitrīm abhinirharati /
S06pplg1__u:775: atra śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na mātsaryacittam utpādayati /
S06pplg1__u:776: na dauḥśīlyacittaṃ na vyāpādacittaṃ na kausīdyacittaṃ (LPG 27v)
